overview: “LOVELESS” (LWR0214) is an infectious virus from the next generation，In a short period of one year, it led to more than 20,000 cases of love credit bankruptcy worldwide.The Japanese government is promoting a “Human Optimizing Plan”, using an omniscient system to track the love credit of all citizens.ROLAND is an underground idol that sells love to those who have lost all their love credit as well as the ability to love. He is the notorious “Savior of Love Disability” at Kabukicho, Shinjuku.
title: Loveless
